title: BC群组服子服务器无连接自动返回登录服
author: l55520
txt_content:
RT，在群组服中，我配置的子服务器生存服无连接时，怎么样才能自动连接到我配置的登录服，bc的config.yml。和bc版本如下：


 prevent_proxy_connections: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25565
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  tab_list: SERVER
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  ping_passthrough: true
  priorities:
  - 登录服/大厅服
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25565
  max_players: 256
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: true
remote_ping_cache: -1
network_compression_threshold: 256
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
log_pings: true
connection_throttle_limit: 3
server_connect_timeout: 5000
timeout: 30000
player_limit: 256
fallback_server: 登录服/大厅服
ip_forward: false
groups: {}
remote_ping_timeout: 5000
connection_throttle: 4000
log_commands: false
stats: 2f6b45e1-c967-4d2a-9fb0-ef6444bfc017
online_mode: false
forge_support: false
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
servers:
  登录服/大厅服:
    motd: '&1登录服'
    address: localhost:25567
    restricted: false
  湮灭生存服:
    motd: '&1生存服'
    address: localhost:25568
    restricted: false
  湮灭空岛服:
    motd: '&1空岛服'
    address: localhost:25566
    restricted: false
